txt.en: Cal Sprigley is concerned about a particularly dangerous and aggressive boar living near a watering hole just east of his farm.

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'While we seem to have made it through the worst with the Blackwolds, there is still one threat that my farmhands and I can't seem to silence. 

'There is a great, vicious boar that lives somewhere to the east of my farm. His den is built in an old, rotting tree stump. Folks call him Old Bloodtusk, but I call him a nuisance! Always rooting for food near my hedge. He once broke through the hedge and gored a farmhand in my field.

'With all that is going on, it may seem a bit foolish, but that boar isn't right and is better dead than alive.'
Old Bloodtusk's den, which is built in a rotten, old tree stump, lies east of Sprigley's Farm.\n\nCal Sprigley has asked you to dispose of Old Bloodtusk before the boar can bring harm to anyone else.

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'While we seem to have made it through the worst with the Blackwolds, there is still one threat that my farmhands and I can't seem to silence. 

'There is a great, vicious boar that lives somewhere to the east of my farm. His den is built in an old, rotting tree stump. Folks call him Old Bloodtusk, but I call him a nuisance! Always rooting for food near my hedge. He once broke through the hedge and gored a farmhand in my field.

'With all that is going on, it may seem a bit foolish, but that boar isn't right and is better dead than alive.'
Cal Sprigley awaits your return.\n\nAt Cal Sprigley's request, you hunted and slew the great boar Old Bloodtusk. You should return to the farmer with news of your success.
'Old Bloodtusk's den is south-east of Bronwe's Folly and east of my farm. If you kill the boar, I'll be sure to treat you right for your service.'

'When all this finally is over, I will have one less worry on my farm thanks to you, [placeholder].\n\n'That boar was a menace to a great lot of the farmers in the area. Without him, we might get our farmlands flourishing again!'
'Old Bloodtusk's den is south-east of Bronwe's Folly and east of my farm. If you kill the boar, I'll be sure to treat you right for your service.'
